apps.caption: PhoneGap Media Object Sample
apps.tooltip: Use a PhoneGap media object to record and playback audio sound.
apps.description: Use a PhoneGap media object to record and playback audio. Also detects if a previous recording exists.

apps.caption: PhoneGap Camera API Sample
apps.tooltip: Capture a photo using the device camera and edit (zoom and crop) the picture.
apps.description: Capture photos with the device camera and retrieve photos from a saved photo album using the PhoneGap Camera API. Demonstrates the variety of configurations with which photos can be captured. Uses jQuery and jQuery Mobile.

apps.caption: PhoneGap Contacts API Sample
apps.tooltip: Interact with device contact database
apps.description: Interact with the device contact database using the PhoneGap Contacts API.

apps.caption: PhoneGap Compass API Sample
apps.tooltip: Simple PhoneGap compass application
apps.description: A compass application to demonstrate the use of the PhoneGap Compass API.

apps.caption: Bubble Level
apps.tooltip: BubbleLevel measures angles with the PhoneGap Accelerometer API
apps.description: BubbleLevel measures surface angles using the PhoneGap Accelerometer API and changes its skin as a function of the device orientation.

apps.caption: Labyrinth Game
apps.tooltip: Simple game demonstrates the PhoneGap Accelerometer API.
apps.description: Connect the Intel logo with the mobile phone icon using the PhoneGap device accelerometer. The board map is generated dynamically.

apps.caption: Handbell
apps.tooltip: Using PhoneGap Media
apps.description: Shake a picture of a bell and hear sounds. A demonstration of the PhoneGap media object.

apps.caption: ToDo List
apps.tooltip: ToDo List Sample
apps.description: An HTML5 web app that has been converted to a device app using PhoneGap.

apps.caption: Counting Beads Game
apps.tooltip: A simple HTML5 game for kids
apps.description: A simple game built using HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3 and jQuery that teaches young kids counting up to 50.

apps.caption: HTML5 Geolocation using Canvas
apps.tooltip: Use geolocation data to render graphics on a canvas element
apps.description: This HTML5 application was built using the Geolocation and Canvas API and uses geolocation data as a mechanism in which rendering of graphics onto a canvas element takes place based on the indicated relative location.

apps.caption: Flood Puzzle Game
apps.tooltip: Flood Puzzle Game
apps.description: A flood game, similar to Color Flood or Flood-it, where the goal is to fill the field with a single color using the minimum number of color transitions

apps.caption: RPN Calculator
apps.tooltip: Reverse Polish Notation Calculator
apps.description: A Themable Stack based calculator using reverse polish notation, akin to the HP calculators that were popular with engineers and scientists in the 1980s. Several different themes are included, with different color schemes, styles and button animations.

apps.caption: Where Is My Car
apps.tooltip: Single source web app or PhoneGap app
apps.description: Unifies startup events so that a single source code base can run as both a web app and as a PhoneGap app; while taking advantage of device features. Uses GeoLocation and LocalStorage APIs.

apps.caption: Towers of Hanoi
apps.tooltip: Animated Towers of Hanoi Puzzle
apps.description: Illustrates use of CSS and jQuery to animate solving the Towers of Hanoi puzzle. The game dynamically scales itself to fit any screen size.

apps.caption: jQM List Nav
apps.tooltip: jQuery Mobile scaffold using list-based navigation
apps.description: A multi-page jQuery Mobile scaffold using list-based navigation. To familiarize yourself with jQuery Mobile pages and basic widgets like toolbars and listviews.

apps.caption: Bubblewrap
apps.tooltip: Scalable bubble popping game
apps.description: Bubblewrap is a fun bubble popping game implemented with HTML5/Javascript technology that illustrates adaptation to various sized screens.

apps.caption: jQM Tab Nav
apps.tooltip: jQuery Mobile scaffold using tab-based navigation
apps.description: A multi-page jQuery Mobile scaffold using tab-based navigation. It also demonstrates how to create a custom options menu widget that maintains state across page transitions; and how to dynamically inject widgets into the DOM.

apps.caption: jQM Springboard Nav
apps.tooltip: jQuery Mobile scaffold using springboard-based navigation
apps.description: A multi-page jQuery Mobile scaffold using springboard-based navigation. It also demonstrates custom styling techniques to adapt to various screen sizes and rotations, and achieve a different look and feel than jQuery Mobile defaults.

apps.caption: HTML5 Local Storage
apps.tooltip: HTML5 Local Storage
apps.description: An application that demonstrates the use HTML5 local storage: how to use HTML5 Local storage features, how to set key/value pairs and how to retrieve key/value pairs.

apps.caption: HTML5 Web SQL Storage
apps.tooltip: HTML5 Web SQL Storage
apps.description: Demonstrates the HTML5 Web SQL storage features: how to set key/value pairs and how to retrieve key/value pairs using Web SQL storage.

apps.caption: Touch and Move
apps.tooltip: Use touch and mouse events to move elements
apps.description: Demonstrates how to create movable objects using JavaScript.
